author: Brad Bmb
comment: This app was great.... until they hit you with recharge credit. I had had the app for nearly 4 years with free calling. But now Like a prepaid service you must now pay for minutes.. Trash. We download vonage because it's free. Now it's just went into the garbage can of the app store for greed. 1 star if you agree.

author: Darious Jones
comment: The best app I've ever download. Really useful in my situation. I had no way of reaching my fiance but then I found this app, and was really very thankful that it actually works, no false advertising like the rest. Sorry for the poor rating , I give this app a 💯. Thanks alot.

I have been using this app past few years and its excellent but past 2 days it started giving me a lot of trouble. I am not able to make calls and if somehow connected then not at all able to disconnect. Its just getting hang everytime. Any help will be highly appreciated.
title: Need help

author: latasheka walker
comment: Idk what happened but now when I try to sign into the app it says it's the wrong password. I sign in online it's works just fine. Will canceling service if I can't see it on my phone

author: Donna Santiago
comment: I will rewrite my review if called back or email.toward my 6 complaining calls and sorry but good bye and hello is NJ way of state is cutting you off. So training of what and how to used to who and when is another problem one esglaisted I hope done. Thank you and I teach them but ask my education level. Let's prove there's

author: M Coffey
comment: Half the time whether on Wifi or LTE it won't connect. Other times it tells me I don't have enough credits for FREE calls. But, when it does finally work, good call quality.
title: Its okay

comment: Vonage co changes rates on local usa calls, but never notifies customers. Excellent 5 star app otherwise, can not trust the rates anymore! Sad. Hope it doesn't go downhill...

author: sibin george
comment: how can i add credits? when i tried through Google pay option it showing payment unsuccessful. is there any method to pay directly using debit or credit cards?

author: Priyanka Shenkamalam
comment: Its good and easy! Cant imagine to reach out people abroad with normal calls, its so expensive! & other online apps are not that effective and with clarity as vonage is! Thank you, vonage! :)
title: Priyanka shen

author: luis lastiri
comment: Hi, your application isn't fully compatible with Android 7... There's compatibility issue that your app prevents the user to turn the flashlight on in order for the user to be able to have function of the device flashlight the user must first open your app in order to be able to use flashlight from device... Your app has a hold on "flash in use" even if the user isn't using your app... Can you update your app? Thank you

author: Melissa L
comment: Ugh! This used to be one of my favourite apps but for some reason I can't sign up for this app on my new phone... Thus I am unable to use it ... I will change my review once this is fixed!

author: Haser Buen
comment: (Update) 8/25/17 I purchased 4.99 credits (USD).  After placing first call inside U.S. I  discovered that calls within the US are no longer free. I changed my 4.5 star rating to  2 stars to express my dissent and dissatisfaction.  To maintain customer loyalty, Vonage will listen to the customers or lose customers.

author: Anvesh Reddy Chinthareddy
comment: Was working fine till last few months. It's not allowing to make any outgoing calls since 2 months. Nothing wrong from the app. Must be on server side

author: k williams
comment: Use to love this app but not sure what happened. Now I am getting a request to add credits to make calls to numbers I've never had to pay for before.
The app will not recognize my email. I logged in to my account online and verified my email. This version of the app will not allow me to log in.

author: Ariana Mastin
comment: Well. IPhone Vonage app keeps the latest updates and is much better to make calls. Unlike  android app has bugs, keeps cutting the call. And that is on LTE on high speeds. While on WiFi is even worst.

author: Gregory Henry
comment: Easy and intuitive to use. Nothing in life is free, so to what extent are these free services? Idk. But its made some distant relatives  smile, so that counts for something. Good app
I'm trying to make a free call and it's not going true so I don't know what's wrong.... please help me sort it out

author: news news
comment: I love the experience I have using vonage, but please bring back the option for incoming calls.
title: Best voip (outgoing) calling app

author: Jael Beltran
comment: We were in Mexico when we began to use the app. Pros: ONLY WITH WIFI we were able to send and receive calls to and from USA numbers went through with minimum issues,and the  received videos through message ok. CONS: While in Veracruz Mexico; No single call nor text were through and received from Mexican numbers, and we were charged just to dial, NO VIDEO CALLS AT ALL, calls drops consistenly, when a call succeed; interference is a constant issue.
title: Desapointed

author: Bassam Nuqul
comment: have been using this app past few years and its excellent but past 2 days it started giving me a lot of trouble. I am not able to make calls . i do have a lot of credit but it seems it charge me 19c per 0 min used  and when u do not have an answer you still get charged for 0 international call  , i need help

author: Keith Bruner
comment: This app works exactly as advertised. Call quality is great and it even uploads all your contacts for you. No complaints whatsoever yet.
title: Incredible, there's no catch!

author: Dan Finch
comment: There should be an option allowing it to answer incoming international calls in order to avoid higher charges from the carrier.

author: Teri McGarr
comment: We have used Vonage for 6 years. And across from us to uk. I downloaded vonage to all my family members phones or told them to. Its a lifesaver.

author: Victoria Amazu
comment: I have installed this app but once it gets to the signing up part it just doesn't work. I am so disappointed because I expected more due to what I already heard about the app. Once it gets to verification the app just closes and says sign up again before I can type in the verification code.please fix it

author: Okunbor Nelson
comment: I thought only international calls were not free. I now have to pay just to call US

author: helooo1
comment: It doesn't have good international rates for calls it's very expensive, if it just  for the app it's the same like the rest of them I already have Skype no need to download another one

author: sandy reid
comment: Im not happy and thinking to switch on other apps coz they been cutting down my minutes eventhough no answer my call on the other line once it start ringing they start xutting down  ir minutes not fair😭😭😭

author: Cherry Cardona
comment: I've tried to place several calls and keep receiving a WRONG NUMBER  message, then I dial directly from my mobile and the numbers turn out to be right.
title: Frustrating

author: Mitch Ramsey
comment: Before the recent update you could link your phone number to the app and make free calls to any number over wifi on any phone. Now you have to either pay to make calls or have the other party install the app.
Really scumy practices, before it was FREE calling the US now they decide to charge out of nowhere! Uninstalling this garbage and going back to magic jack.

author: Abdelkader Chelli
comment: Every time I try to phone internationally, my interlocutor can't hear me or the sound quality is beyond bad... waiting for a fix or update of this app but none since I installed it couple of years ago. Still using the app for local call as credit on it.  But very disappointed as I downloaded it for international calls to start with...
Y can't i delete the numbers that I call
title: Hi can delete the numbers that i call y i hate this app for that

author: Rob Grenier
comment: I have a 2nd home in a remote area and through internet I can make the calls when needed. Great app!

author: Vijaya Suthakar Paramasivan
comment: It says free credit top up 1$ if your friend download and install.But my friends downloaded and installed but I DID NOT get the credit for that.

author: Xavier Raj
comment: It's not complete signing up process. The app closes after receiving verification code saying it faces error in creating account.

author: Jennifer Williams
comment: Works very well and you can vedio call people, but they have to also have the app for you to be able to call them

author: Feeltheshadow 20
comment: It wouldn't send me the code so I can verify its my number and keeps telling me something went wrong. Now it locked my account n said try later. Bulltit app

author: Kesniel Henle
comment: It's a worst app now not making calls any more I think they show solve the problem

author: Isaac Abanda
comment: I think this app is a scam. they cut my minutes without me being able to place a single call.  i hate this app
